00023 #include "staticmeshdialog.h"

00025 #include <QHBoxLayout>
00026 #include <QVBoxLayout>
00027 #include <QLabel>
00028 #include <QWidget>
00029 #include <QPushButton>

00035 #include "meshviewerstats.h"

00043 RainbruRPG::Editor::StaticMeshDialog::
00044 StaticMeshDialog(const char* meshName, QWidget* parent)
00045   :QDialog(parent)
00046 
00047 {
00048   LOGI("Opening a static mesh dialog");
00049   LOGCATS("Mesh name :");
00050   LOGCATS(meshName);
00051   LOGCAT();
00052 
00053   xol=new xmlObjectList();
00054   mesh=xol->getObjectMeshByName(meshName);
00055 
00056 
00057   setWindowTitle( tr("Object properties") );
00058   this->meshName=meshName;
00059 
00060   QVBoxLayout* layout=new QVBoxLayout(this);
00061   this->setLayout(layout);
00062 
00063   QHBoxLayout* hlayout=new QHBoxLayout(this);
00064   layout->addLayout(hlayout);
00065 
00066   // TabWidget
00067   QTabWidget* toolTab = new QTabWidget();
00068   //  toolTab->setMinimumSize(243, 350);
00069   hlayout->addWidget(toolTab);
00070 
00071   infoPanel(toolTab);
00072   positionsPanel(toolTab);
00073 
00074   // Viewer
00075   QVBoxLayout* mvLayout=new QVBoxLayout(this);
00076   hlayout->addLayout(mvLayout);
00077 
00078   meshViewer=new MeshViewer(this);
00079   meshViewer->addMesh(mesh->getMeshFile());
00080   mvLayout->addWidget(meshViewer);
00081 
00082   MeshViewerStats* mvs=new MeshViewerStats();
00083   mvLayout->addWidget(mvs);
00084 
00085   // OK Button
00086   QPushButton *pb=new QPushButton( tr("OK"), this);
00087   pb->setDefault(true);
00088   pb->setMaximumWidth( 100 );
00089   layout->addWidget(pb);
00090 
00091   QObject::connect(meshViewer, SIGNAL(updateFpsCount(int)),
00092                    mvs, SLOT(setFps(int)));
00093   QObject::connect(meshViewer, SIGNAL(updateTriCount(int)),
00094                    mvs, SLOT(setTri(int)));
00095 
00096   QObject::connect(pb, SIGNAL(clicked()), SLOT(accept()));
00097 
00098 
00099   LOGI("Static mesh dialog created");
00100 
00101 }
00102 
00106 RainbruRPG::Editor::StaticMeshDialog::~StaticMeshDialog(){
00107   delete meshViewer;
00108   meshViewer=NULL;
00109 
00110   delete xol;
00111   xol=NULL;
00112 
00113   mesh=NULL;
00114 }

00121 void RainbruRPG::Editor::StaticMeshDialog::infoPanel(QTabWidget* parent){
00122 
00123   QWidget* infoTab=new QWidget();
00124   parent->addTab(infoTab, tr("Infos") );
00125 
00126   // name
00127   QGridLayout* grid=new QGridLayout(infoTab);
00128   QLabel* nameLabel=new QLabel(tr("Nom"), infoTab);
00129   grid->addWidget(nameLabel, 0, 0);
00130   QLabel* nameLabel2=new QLabel(mesh->getName().c_str(), infoTab);
00131   grid->addWidget(nameLabel2, 0, 10);
00132 
00133   // Type
00134   QLabel* typeLabel=new QLabel(tr("Type"), infoTab);
00135   grid->addWidget(typeLabel, 1, 0);
00136   QLabel* typeLabel2=new QLabel("static", infoTab);
00137   grid->addWidget(typeLabel2, 1, 10);
00138 
00139   // Meshfile
00140   // Type
00141   QLabel* fileLabel=new QLabel(tr("Filename"), infoTab);
00142   grid->addWidget(fileLabel, 2, 0);
00143   QLabel* fileLabel2=new QLabel(mesh->getMeshFile(), infoTab);
00144   grid->addWidget(fileLabel2, 2, 10);
00145 
00146 
00147 
00148 }

00155 void RainbruRPG::Editor::StaticMeshDialog::positionsPanel(QTabWidget* parent){
00156   QWidget* posTab=new QWidget();
00157   parent->addTab(posTab, tr("Positions") );
00158 
00159   QHBoxLayout* hlayout=new QHBoxLayout(posTab);
00160   posTab->setLayout(hlayout);
00161 
00162   QTreeWidget* tree=new QTreeWidget(posTab);
00163   hlayout->addWidget(tree);
00164 
00165   QStringList header;
00166   header << tr("Name") << "x" << "y" << "z" << "rw" << "rx" << "ry" << "rz";
00167 
00168   tree->setColumnCount(7);
00169   tree->setHeaderLabels(header);
00170 
00171 }
